intrinsic.name: _bswap

intrinsic.name: _mm_max_pi16

intrinsic.operation: FOR j := 0 to 3 i := j*16 dst[i+15:i] := MAX(a[i+15:i], b[i+15:i]) ENDFOR

intrinsic.description: Moves high byte from "k2" to low byte of "k1", and moves low byte of "k2" to high byte of "k1".

intrinsic.name: _mm512_mulhi_epu32
intrinsic.description: Performs element-by-element multiplication between packed unsigned 32-bit integer elements in "a" and "b" and stores the high 32 bits of each result into "dst".
intrinsic.operation: FOR j := 0 to 15 i := j*32 dst[i+31:i] := (a[i+31:i] * b[i+31:i]) >> 32 ENDFOR dst[MAX:512] := 0

intrinsic.name: _mm512_mulhi_epi32
intrinsic.description: Performs element-by-element multiplication between packed 32-bit integer elements in "a" and "b" and stores the high 32 bits of each result into "dst".
intrinsic.operation: FOR j := 0 to 15 i := j*32 dst[i+31:i] := (a[i+31:i] * b[i+31:i]) >> 32 ENDFOR dst[MAX:512] := 0

intrinsic.name: _mm512_fmadd_epi32
intrinsic.description: Multiply packed 32-bit integer elements in "a" and "b", add the intermediate result to packed elements in "c" and store the results in "dst".
intrinsic.operation: FOR j := 0 to 15 i := j*32 dst[i+31:i] := (a[i+31:i] * b[i+31:i]) + c[i+31:i] ENDFOR dst[MAX:512] := 0

intrinsic.name: _mm512_kmovlhb
intrinsic.description: Inserts the low byte of mask "k2" into the high byte of "dst", and copies the low byte of "k1" to the low byte of "dst".

intrinsic.name: _mm512_subr_epi32
intrinsic.description: Performs element-by-element subtraction of packed 32-bit integer elements in "v2" from "v3" storing the results in "dst".
intrinsic.operation: FOR j := 0 to 15 i := j*32 dst[i+31:i] := v3[i+31:i] - v2[i+31:i] ENDFOR dst[MAX:512] := 0

intrinsic.name: _mm512_kxor
intrinsic.description: Compute the bitwise XOR of 16-bit masks "a" and "b", and store the result in "k".

intrinsic.name: _mm512_kor
intrinsic.description: Compute the bitwise OR of 16-bit masks "a" and "b", and store the result in "k".

intrinsic.name: _mm512_kand
intrinsic.description: Compute the bitwise AND of 16-bit masks "a" and "b", and store the result in "k".

intrinsic.name: _mm512_kmov
intrinsic.description: Copy 16-bit mask "a" to "k".

intrinsic.name: _blsr_u32
intrinsic.description: Copy all bits from unsigned 32-bit integer "a" to "dst", and reset (set to 0) the bit in "dst" that corresponds to the lowest set bit in "a".
intrinsic.operation: dst := (a - 1) AND a

intrinsic.name: _blsr_u64
intrinsic.description: Copy all bits from unsigned 64-bit integer "a" to "dst", and reset (set to 0) the bit in "dst" that corresponds to the lowest set bit in "a".
intrinsic.operation: dst := (a - 1) AND a

intrinsic.name: _blsmsk_u32
intrinsic.description: Set all the lower bits of "dst" up to and including the lowest set bit in unsigned 32-bit integer "a".
intrinsic.operation: dst := (a - 1) XOR a

intrinsic.name: _blsmsk_u64
intrinsic.description: Set all the lower bits of "dst" up to and including the lowest set bit in unsigned 64-bit integer "a".
intrinsic.operation: dst := (a - 1) XOR a

intrinsic.name: _mm_permutexvar_epi8
intrinsic.description: Shuffle 8-bit integers in "a" using the corresponding index in "idx", and store the results in "dst".
intrinsic.operation: FOR j := 0 to 15 i := j*8 id := idx[i+3:i]*8 dst[i+7:i] := a[id+7:id] ENDFOR dst[MAX:128] := 0

intrinsic.name: _mm_permutex2var_epi8
intrinsic.description: Shuffle 8-bit integers in "a" and "b" using the corresponding selector and index in "idx", and store the results in "dst".
intrinsic.operation: FOR j := 0 to 15 i := j*8 off := 8*idx[i+3:i] dst[i+7:i] := idx[i+4] ? b[off+7:off] : a[off+7:off] ENDFOR dst[MAX:128] := 0

intrinsic.name: _mm256_permutex2var_epi8
intrinsic.description: Shuffle 8-bit integers in "a" and "b" across lanes using the corresponding selector and index in "idx", and store the results in "dst".
intrinsic.operation: FOR j := 0 to 31 i := j*8 off := 8*idx[i+4:i] dst[i+7:i] := idx[i+5] ? b[off+7:off] : a[off+7:off] ENDFOR dst[MAX:256] := 0

intrinsic.name: _mm512_permutex2var_epi8
intrinsic.description: Shuffle 8-bit integers in "a" and "b" across lanes using the corresponding selector and index in "idx", and store the results in "dst".
intrinsic.operation: FOR j := 0 to 63 i := j*8 off := 8*idx[i+5:i] dst[i+7:i] := idx[i+6] ? b[off+7:off] : a[off+7:off] ENDFOR dst[MAX:512] := 0

intrinsic.name: _mm256_permutexvar_epi8
intrinsic.description: Shuffle 8-bit integers in "a" across lanes using the corresponding index in "idx", and store the results in "dst".
intrinsic.operation: FOR j := 0 to 31 i := j*8 id := idx[i+4:i]*8 dst[i+7:i] := a[id+7:id] ENDFOR dst[MAX:256] := 0

intrinsic.name: _mm512_permutexvar_epi8
intrinsic.description: Shuffle 8-bit integers in "a" across lanes using the corresponding index in "idx", and store the results in "dst".
intrinsic.operation: FOR j := 0 to 63 i := j*8 id := idx[i+5:i]*8 dst[i+7:i] := a[id+7:id] ENDFOR dst[MAX:512] := 0

intrinsic.name: _mm512_xor_epi64
intrinsic.description: Compute the bitwise XOR of packed 64-bit integers in "a" and "b", and store the results in "dst".
intrinsic.operation: FOR j := 0 to 7 i := j*64 dst[i+63:i] := a[i+63:i] XOR b[i+63:i] ENDFOR dst[MAX:512] := 0

intrinsic.name: _mm512_xor_si512
intrinsic.description: Compute the bitwise XOR of 512 bits (representing integer data) in "a" and "b", and store the result in "dst".

intrinsic.name: _mm512_xor_epi32
intrinsic.description: Compute the bitwise XOR of packed 32-bit integers in "a" and "b", and store the results in "dst".
intrinsic.operation: FOR j := 0 to 15 i := j*32 dst[i+31:i] := a[i+31:i] XOR b[i+31:i] ENDFOR dst[MAX:512] := 0

intrinsic.name: _mm512_sub_epi32
intrinsic.description: Subtract packed 32-bit integers in "b" from packed 32-bit integers in "a", and store the results in "dst".
intrinsic.operation: FOR j := 0 to 15 i := j*32 dst[i+31:i] := a[i+31:i] - b[i+31:i] ENDFOR dst[MAX:512] := 0

intrinsic.name: _mm512_or_epi64
intrinsic.description: Compute the bitwise OR of packed 64-bit integers in "a" and "b", and store the resut in "dst".
intrinsic.operation: FOR j := 0 to 7 i := j*64 dst[i+63:i] := a[i+63:i] OR b[i+63:i] ENDFOR dst[MAX:512] := 0

intrinsic.name: _mm512_or_epi32
intrinsic.description: Compute the bitwise OR of packed 32-bit integers in "a" and "b", and store the results in "dst".
intrinsic.operation: FOR j := 0 to 15 i := j*32 dst[i+31:i] := a[i+31:i] OR b[i+31:i] ENDFOR dst[MAX:512] := 0

intrinsic.name: _mm512_or_si512
intrinsic.description: Compute the bitwise OR of 512 bits (representing integer data) in "a" and "b", and store the result in "dst".

intrinsic.name: _mm512_min_epu32
intrinsic.description: Compare packed unsigned 32-bit integers in "a" and "b", and store packed minimum values in "dst".
intrinsic.operation: FOR j := 0 to 15 i := j*32 dst[i+31:i] := MIN(a[i+31:i], b[i+31:i]) ENDFOR dst[MAX:512] := 0

intrinsic.name: _mm512_min_epi32
intrinsic.description: Compare packed signed 32-bit integers in "a" and "b", and store packed minimum values in "dst".
intrinsic.operation: FOR j := 0 to 15 i := j*32 dst[i+31:i] := MIN(a[i+31:i], b[i+31:i]) ENDFOR dst[MAX:512] := 0

intrinsic.name: _mm512_max_epu32
intrinsic.description: Compare packed unsigned 32-bit integers in "a" and "b", and store packed maximum values in "dst".
intrinsic.operation: FOR j := 0 to 15 i := j*32 dst[i+31:i] := MAX(a[i+31:i], b[i+31:i]) ENDFOR dst[MAX:512] := 0

intrinsic.name: _mm512_max_epi32
intrinsic.description: Compare packed signed 32-bit integers in "a" and "b", and store packed maximum values in "dst".
intrinsic.operation: FOR j := 0 to 15 i := j*32 dst[i+31:i] := MAX(a[i+31:i], b[i+31:i]) ENDFOR dst[MAX:512] := 0

intrinsic.name: _mm512_permutevar_epi32
intrinsic.description: Shuffle 32-bit integers in "a" across lanes using the corresponding index in "idx", and store the results in "dst". Note that this intrinsic shuffles across 128-bit lanes, unlike past intrinsics that use the "permutevar" name. This intrinsic is identical to "_mm512_permutexvar_epi32", and it is recommended that you use that intrinsic name.
intrinsic.operation: FOR j := 0 to 15 i := j*32 id := idx[i+3:i]*32 dst[i+31:i] := a[id+31:id] ENDFOR dst[MAX:512] := 0

intrinsic.name: _mm512_and_epi64
intrinsic.description: Compute the bitwise AND of 512 bits (composed of packed 64-bit integers) in "a" and "b", and store the results in "dst".

intrinsic.name: _mm512_and_si512
intrinsic.description: Compute the bitwise AND of 512 bits (representing integer data) in "a" and "b", and store the result in "dst".

intrinsic.name: _mm512_add_epi32
intrinsic.description: Add packed 32-bit integers in "a" and "b", and store the results in "dst".
intrinsic.operation: FOR j := 0 to 15 i := j*32 dst[i+31:i] := a[i+31:i] + b[i+31:i] ENDFOR dst[MAX:512] := 0

intrinsic.name: _mm512_cvtsi512_si32
intrinsic.description: Copy the lower 32-bit integer in "a" to "dst".

intrinsic.name: _mm512_int2mask
intrinsic.description: Converts integer "mask" into bitmask, storing the result in "dst".
intrinsic.operation: dst := mask[15:0]

intrinsic.name: _mm512_unpacklo_epi64
intrinsic.description: Unpack and interleave 64-bit integers from the low half of each 128-bit lane in "a" and "b", and store the results in "dst".
intrinsic.operation: DEFINE INTERLEAVE_QWORDS(src1[127:0], src2[127:0]) { dst[63:0] := src1[63:0] dst[127:64] := src2[63:0] RETURN dst[127:0] } dst[127:0] := INTERLEAVE_QWORDS(a[127:0], b[127:0]) dst[255:128] := INTERLEAVE_QWORDS(a[255:128], b[255:128]) dst[383:256] := INTERLEAVE_QWORDS(a[383:256], b[383:256]) dst[511:384] := INTERLEAVE_QWORDS(a[511:384], b[511:384]) dst[MAX:512] := 0

intrinsic.name: _mm512_unpacklo_epi32
intrinsic.description: Unpack and interleave 32-bit integers from the low half of each 128-bit lane in "a" and "b", and store the results in "dst".

intrinsic.name: _mm512_unpackhi_epi64
intrinsic.description: Unpack and interleave 64-bit integers from the high half of each 128-bit lane in "a" and "b", and store the results in "dst".
intrinsic.operation: DEFINE INTERLEAVE_HIGH_QWORDS(src1[127:0], src2[127:0]) { dst[63:0] := src1[127:64] dst[127:64] := src2[127:64] RETURN dst[127:0] } dst[127:0] := INTERLEAVE_HIGH_QWORDS(a[127:0], b[127:0]) dst[255:128] := INTERLEAVE_HIGH_QWORDS(a[255:128], b[255:128]) dst[383:256] := INTERLEAVE_HIGH_QWORDS(a[383:256], b[383:256]) dst[511:384] := INTERLEAVE_HIGH_QWORDS(a[511:384], b[511:384]) dst[MAX:512] := 0

intrinsic.name: _mm512_unpackhi_epi32
intrinsic.description: Unpack and interleave 32-bit integers from the high half of each 128-bit lane in "a" and "b", and store the results in "dst".
intrinsic.operation: DEFINE INTERLEAVE_HIGH_DWORDS(src1[127:0], src2[127:0]) { dst[31:0] := src1[95:64] dst[63:32] := src2[95:64] dst[95:64] := src1[127:96] dst[127:96] := src2[127:96] RETURN dst[127:0] } dst[127:0] := INTERLEAVE_HIGH_DWORDS(a[127:0], b[127:0]) dst[255:128] := INTERLEAVE_HIGH_DWORDS(a[255:128], b[255:128]) dst[383:256] := INTERLEAVE_HIGH_DWORDS(a[383:256], b[383:256]) dst[511:384] := INTERLEAVE_HIGH_DWORDS(a[511:384], b[511:384]) dst[MAX:512] := 0

intrinsic.name: _mm512_sub_epi64
intrinsic.description: Subtract packed 64-bit integers in "b" from packed 64-bit integers in "a", and store the results in "dst".
intrinsic.operation: FOR j := 0 to 7 i := j*64 dst[i+63:i] := a[i+63:i] - b[i+63:i] ENDFOR dst[MAX:512] := 0

intrinsic.name: _mm512_mul_epu32
intrinsic.description: Multiply the low unsigned 32-bit integers from each packed 64-bit element in "a" and "b", and store the unsigned 64-bit results in "dst".
intrinsic.operation: FOR j := 0 to 7 i := j*64 dst[i+63:i] := a[i+31:i] * b[i+31:i] ENDFOR dst[MAX:512] := 0

intrinsic.name: _mm512_min_epu64
intrinsic.description: Compare packed unsigned 64-bit integers in "a" and "b", and store packed minimum values in "dst".
intrinsic.operation: FOR j := 0 to 7 i := j*64 dst[i+63:i] := MIN(a[i+63:i], b[i+63:i]) ENDFOR dst[MAX:512] := 0

intrinsic.name: _mm512_min_epi64
intrinsic.description: Compare packed signed 64-bit integers in "a" and "b", and store packed minimum values in "dst".
intrinsic.operation: FOR j := 0 to 7 i := j*64 dst[i+63:i] := MIN(a[i+63:i], b[i+63:i]) ENDFOR dst[MAX:512] := 0

intrinsic.name: _mm512_max_epu64

intrinsic.operation: FOR j := 0 to 7 i := j*64 dst[i+63:i] := MAX(a[i+63:i], b[i+63:i]) ENDFOR dst[MAX:512] := 0

intrinsic.description: Compare packed signed 64-bit integers in "a" and "b", and store packed maximum values in "dst".
intrinsic.operation: FOR j := 0 to 7 i := j*64 dst[i+63:i] := MAX(a[i+63:i], b[i+63:i]) ENDFOR dst[MAX:512] := 0

intrinsic.name: _mm512_permutexvar_epi64
intrinsic.description: Shuffle 64-bit integers in "a" across lanes using the corresponding index in "idx", and store the results in "dst".
intrinsic.operation: FOR j := 0 to 7 i := j*64 id := idx[i+2:i]*64 dst[i+63:i] := a[id+63:id] ENDFOR dst[MAX:512] := 0

intrinsic.name: _mm512_permutex2var_epi64
intrinsic.description: Shuffle 64-bit integers in "a" and "b" across lanes using the corresponding selector and index in "idx", and store the results in "dst".
intrinsic.operation: FOR j := 0 to 7 i := j*64 off := idx[i+2:i]*64 dst[i+63:i] := idx[i+3] ? b[off+63:off] : a[off+63:off] ENDFOR dst[MAX:512] := 0

intrinsic.name: _mm_cmplt_epi8
intrinsic.description: Compare packed signed 8-bit integers in "a" and "b" for less-than, and store the results in "dst". Note: This intrinsic emits the pcmpgtb instruction with the order of the operands switched.
intrinsic.operation: FOR j := 0 to 15 i := j*8 dst[i+7:i] := ( a[i+7:i] < b[i+7:i] ) ? 0xFF : 0 ENDFOR

intrinsic.name: _mm_cmpgt_epi32
intrinsic.description: Compare packed signed 32-bit integers in "a" and "b" for greater-than, and store the results in "dst".
intrinsic.operation: FOR j := 0 to 3 i := j*32 dst[i+31:i] := ( a[i+31:i] > b[i+31:i] ) ? 0xFFFFFFFF : 0 ENDFOR

intrinsic.name: _mm_cmplt_epi16

intrinsic.name: _mm512_and_epi32
intrinsic.description: Compute the bitwise AND of packed 32-bit integers in "a" and "b", and store the results in "dst".
intrinsic.operation: FOR j := 0 to 15 i := j*32 dst[i+31:i] := a[i+31:i] AND b[i+31:i] ENDFOR dst[MAX:512] := 0

intrinsic.name: _mm512_andnot_epi32
intrinsic.description: Compute the bitwise NOT of packed 32-bit integers in "a" and then AND with "b", and store the results in "dst".
intrinsic.operation: FOR j := 0 to 15 i := j*32 dst[i+31:i] := (NOT a[i+31:i]) AND b[i+31:i] ENDFOR dst[MAX:512] := 0

intrinsic.name: _mm512_andnot_si512
intrinsic.description: Compute the bitwise NOT of 512 bits (representing integer data) in "a" and then AND with "b", and store the result in "dst".

intrinsic.name: _mm512_andnot_epi64
intrinsic.description: Compute the bitwise NOT of 512 bits (composed of packed 64-bit integers) in "a" and then AND with "b", and store the results in "dst".

intrinsic.name: _mm_adds_epi8
intrinsic.description: Add packed signed 8-bit integers in "a" and "b" using saturation, and store the results in "dst".
intrinsic.operation: FOR j := 0 to 15 i := j*8 dst[i+7:i] := Saturate8( a[i+7:i] + b[i+7:i] ) ENDFOR

intrinsic.name: _mm_adds_epi16
intrinsic.description: Add packed signed 16-bit integers in "a" and "b" using saturation, and store the results in "dst".
intrinsic.operation: FOR j := 0 to 7 i := j*16 dst[i+15:i] := Saturate16( a[i+15:i] + b[i+15:i] ) ENDFOR

intrinsic.name: _mm_adds_epu8
intrinsic.description: Add packed unsigned 8-bit integers in "a" and "b" using saturation, and store the results in "dst".
intrinsic.operation: FOR j := 0 to 15 i := j*8 dst[i+7:i] := SaturateU8( a[i+7:i] + b[i+7:i] ) ENDFOR

intrinsic.name: _mm_adds_epu16
intrinsic.description: Add packed unsigned 16-bit integers in "a" and "b" using saturation, and store the results in "dst".
intrinsic.operation: FOR j := 0 to 7 i := j*16 dst[i+15:i] := SaturateU16( a[i+15:i] + b[i+15:i] ) ENDFOR

intrinsic.name: _mm_mulhi_epi16
intrinsic.description: Multiply the packed signed 16-bit integers in "a" and "b", producing intermediate 32-bit integers, and store the high 16 bits of the intermediate integers in "dst".
intrinsic.operation: FOR j := 0 to 7 i := j*16 tmp[31:0] := SignExtend32(a[i+15:i]) * SignExtend32(b[i+15:i]) dst[i+15:i] := tmp[31:16] ENDFOR

intrinsic.name: _mm_mullo_epi16
intrinsic.description: Multiply the packed 16-bit integers in "a" and "b", producing intermediate 32-bit integers, and store the low 16 bits of the intermediate integers in "dst".
intrinsic.operation: FOR j := 0 to 7 i := j*16 tmp[31:0] := SignExtend32(a[i+15:i]) * SignExtend32(b[i+15:i]) dst[i+15:i] := tmp[15:0] ENDFOR

intrinsic.name: _mm_subs_epi8
intrinsic.description: Subtract packed signed 8-bit integers in "b" from packed 8-bit integers in "a" using saturation, and store the results in "dst".
intrinsic.operation: FOR j := 0 to 15 i := j*8 dst[i+7:i] := Saturate8(a[i+7:i] - b[i+7:i]) ENDFOR

intrinsic.name: _mm_subs_epi16
intrinsic.description: Subtract packed signed 16-bit integers in "b" from packed 16-bit integers in "a" using saturation, and store the results in "dst".
intrinsic.operation: FOR j := 0 to 7 i := j*16 dst[i+15:i] := Saturate16(a[i+15:i] - b[i+15:i]) ENDFOR

intrinsic.name: _mm_subs_epu8
intrinsic.description: Subtract packed unsigned 8-bit integers in "b" from packed unsigned 8-bit integers in "a" using saturation, and store the results in "dst".
intrinsic.operation: FOR j := 0 to 15 i := j*8 dst[i+7:i] := SaturateU8(a[i+7:i] - b[i+7:i]) ENDFOR

intrinsic.name: _mm256_shufflelo_epi16
intrinsic.description: Shuffle 16-bit integers in the low 64 bits of 128-bit lanes of "a" using the control in "imm8". Store the results in the low 64 bits of 128-bit lanes of "dst", with the high 64 bits of 128-bit lanes being copied from from "a" to "dst".

intrinsic.name: _mm512_mask2int
intrinsic.description: Converts bit mask "k1" into an integer value, storing the results in "dst".
intrinsic.operation: dst := ZeroExtend32(k1)

intrinsic.name: _mm_broadcast_i32x2
intrinsic.description: Broadcast the lower 2 packed 32-bit integers from "a" to all elements of "dst.
intrinsic.operation: FOR j := 0 to 3 i := j*32 n := (j % 2)*32 dst[i+31:i] := a[n+31:n] ENDFOR dst[MAX:128] := 0

intrinsic.name: _mm512_broadcast_i32x8
intrinsic.description: Broadcast the 8 packed 32-bit integers from "a" to all elements of "dst".
intrinsic.operation: FOR j := 0 to 15 i := j*32 n := (j % 8)*32 dst[i+31:i] := a[n+31:n] ENDFOR dst[MAX:512] := 0

intrinsic.name: _mm256_broadcast_i64x2
intrinsic.description: Broadcast the 2 packed 64-bit integers from "a" to all elements of "dst".
intrinsic.operation: FOR j := 0 to 3 i := j*64 n := (j % 2)*64 dst[i+63:i] := a[n+63:n] ENDFOR dst[MAX:256] := 0

intrinsic.name: _mm512_broadcast_i64x2
intrinsic.description: Broadcast the 2 packed 64-bit integers from "a" to all elements of "dst".
intrinsic.operation: FOR j := 0 to 7 i := j*64 n := (j % 2)*64 dst[i+63:i] := a[n+63:n] ENDFOR dst[MAX:512] := 0

intrinsic.name: _mm256_broadcast_i32x4
intrinsic.description: Broadcast the 4 packed 32-bit integers from "a" to all elements of "dst".
intrinsic.operation: FOR j := 0 to 7 i := j*32 n := (j % 4)*32 dst[i+31:i] := a[n+31:n] ENDFOR dst[MAX:256] := 0

intrinsic.name: _mm512_broadcast_i32x4
intrinsic.description: Broadcast the 4 packed 32-bit integers from "a" to all elements of "dst".
intrinsic.operation: FOR j := 0 to 15 i := j*32 n := (j % 4)*32 dst[i+31:i] := a[n+31:n] ENDFOR dst[MAX:512] := 0

intrinsic.name: _mm512_broadcast_i64x4
intrinsic.description: Broadcast the 4 packed 64-bit integers from "a" to all elements of "dst".
intrinsic.operation: FOR j := 0 to 7 i := j*64 n := (j % 4)*64 dst[i+63:i] := a[n+63:n] ENDFOR dst[MAX:512] := 0

intrinsic.name: _mm256_broadcast_i32x2
intrinsic.description: Broadcast the lower 2 packed 32-bit integers from "a" to all elements of "dst.
intrinsic.operation: FOR j := 0 to 7 i := j*32 n := (j % 2)*32 dst[i+31:i] := a[n+31:n] ENDFOR dst[MAX:256] := 0

intrinsic.name: _mm_madd_epi16
intrinsic.description: Multiply packed signed 16-bit integers in "a" and "b", producing intermediate signed 32-bit integers. Horizontally add adjacent pairs of intermediate 32-bit integers, and pack the results in "dst".
intrinsic.operation: FOR j := 0 to 3 i := j*32 dst[i+31:i] := SignExtend32(a[i+31:i+16]*b[i+31:i+16]) + SignExtend32(a[i+15:i]*b[i+15:i]) ENDFOR

intrinsic.name: _mm256_madd_epi16
intrinsic.description: Multiply packed signed 16-bit integers in "a" and "b", producing intermediate signed 32-bit integers. Horizontally add adjacent pairs of intermediate 32-bit integers, and pack the results in "dst".
intrinsic.operation: FOR j := 0 to 7 i := j*32 dst[i+31:i] := SignExtend32(a[i+31:i+16]*b[i+31:i+16]) + SignExtend32(a[i+15:i]*b[i+15:i]) ENDFOR dst[MAX:256] := 0

intrinsic.name: _mm512_madd_epi16
intrinsic.description: Multiply packed signed 16-bit integers in "a" and "b", producing intermediate signed 32-bit integers. Horizontally add adjacent pairs of intermediate 32-bit integers, and pack the results in "dst".

intrinsic.name: _mm512_cvtepi8_epi32
intrinsic.description: Sign extend packed 8-bit integers in "a" to packed 32-bit integers, and store the results in "dst".
intrinsic.operation: FOR j := 0 to 15 i := 32*j k := 8*j dst[i+31:i] := SignExtend32(a[k+7:k]) ENDFOR dst[MAX:512] := 0

intrinsic.name: _mm512_cvtepi16_epi32
intrinsic.description: Sign extend packed 16-bit integers in "a" to packed 32-bit integers, and store the results in "dst".
intrinsic.operation: FOR j := 0 to 15 i := 32*j k := 16*j dst[i+31:i] := SignExtend32(a[k+15:k]) ENDFOR dst[MAX:512] := 0

intrinsic.name: _m_pmaddwd
intrinsic.description: Multiply packed signed 16-bit integers in "a" and "b", producing intermediate signed 32-bit integers. Horizontally add adjacent pairs of intermediate 32-bit integers, and pack the results in "dst".
intrinsic.operation: FOR j := 0 to 1 i := j*32 dst[i+31:i] := SignExtend32(a[i+31:i+16]*b[i+31:i+16]) + SignExtend32(a[i+15:i]*b[i+15:i]) ENDFOR

intrinsic.name: _mm_madd_pi16
intrinsic.description: Multiply packed signed 16-bit integers in "a" and "b", producing intermediate signed 32-bit integers. Horizontally add adjacent pairs of intermediate 32-bit integers, and pack the results in "dst".

intrinsic.name: _m_pandn
intrinsic.description: Compute the bitwise NOT of 64 bits (representing integer data) in "a" and then AND with "b", and store the result in "dst".

intrinsic.name: _mm_andnot_si64

intrinsic.name: _mm256_maddubs_epi16
intrinsic.description: Vertically multiply each unsigned 8-bit integer from "a" with the corresponding signed 8-bit integer from "b", producing intermediate signed 16-bit integers. Horizontally add adjacent pairs of intermediate signed 16-bit integers, and pack the saturated results in "dst".
intrinsic.operation: FOR j := 0 to 15 i := j*16 dst[i+15:i] := Saturate16( a[i+15:i+8]*b[i+15:i+8] + a[i+7:i]*b[i+7:i] ) ENDFOR dst[MAX:256] := 0

intrinsic.name: _mm_maddubs_epi16
intrinsic.description: Vertically multiply each unsigned 8-bit integer from "a" with the corresponding signed 8-bit integer from "b", producing intermediate signed 16-bit integers. Horizontally add adjacent pairs of intermediate signed 16-bit integers, and pack the saturated results in "dst".
intrinsic.operation: FOR j := 0 to 7 i := j*16 dst[i+15:i] := Saturate16( a[i+15:i+8]*b[i+15:i+8] + a[i+7:i]*b[i+7:i] ) ENDFOR

intrinsic.name: _mm_maddubs_pi16
intrinsic.description: Vertically multiply each unsigned 8-bit integer from "a" with the corresponding signed 8-bit integer from "b", producing intermediate signed 16-bit integers. Horizontally add adjacent pairs of intermediate signed 16-bit integers, and pack the saturated results in "dst".

intrinsic.name: _mm_mulhrs_epi16

intrinsic.name: _mm256_max_epi64

intrinsic.name: _mm256_permutexvar_epi64
intrinsic.description: Shuffle 64-bit integers in "a" across lanes using the corresponding index in "idx", and store the results in "dst".
intrinsic.operation: FOR j := 0 to 3 i := j*64 id := idx[i+1:i]*64 dst[i+63:i] := a[id+63:id] ENDFOR dst[MAX:256] := 0

intrinsic.name: _mm_permutex2var_epi64

intrinsic.name: _mm256_permutex2var_epi64

intrinsic.name: _mm512_maddubs_epi16
intrinsic.description: Vertically multiply each unsigned 8-bit integer from "a" with the corresponding signed 8-bit integer from "b", producing intermediate signed 16-bit integers. Horizontally add adjacent pairs of intermediate signed 16-bit integers, and pack the saturated results in "dst".

intrinsic.description: Multiply groups of 2 adjacent pairs of signed 16-bit integers in "a" with corresponding 16-bit integers in "b", producing 2 intermediate signed 32-bit results. Sum these 2 results with the corresponding 32-bit integer in "src" using signed saturation, and store the packed 32-bit results in "dst" using writemask "k" (elements are copied from "src" when the corresponding mask bit is not set).
intrinsic.operation: FOR j := 0 to 15 IF k[j] tmp1.dword := SignExtend32(a.word[2*j]) * SignExtend32(b.word[2*j]) tmp2.dword := SignExtend32(a.word[2*j+1]) * SignExtend32(b.word[2*j+1]) dst.dword[j] := Saturate32(src.dword[j] + tmp1 + tmp2) ELSE dst.dword[j] := src.dword[j] FI ENDFOR dst[MAX:512] := 0

intrinsic.name: _mm512_maskz_dpwssds_epi32
intrinsic.description: Multiply groups of 2 adjacent pairs of signed 16-bit integers in "a" with corresponding 16-bit integers in "b", producing 2 intermediate signed 32-bit results. Sum these 2 results with the corresponding 32-bit integer in "src" using signed saturation, and store the packed 32-bit results in "dst" using zeromask "k" (elements are zeroed out when the corresponding mask bit is not set).
intrinsic.operation: FOR j := 0 to 15 IF k[j] tmp1.dword := SignExtend32(a.word[2*j]) * SignExtend32(b.word[2*j]) tmp2.dword := SignExtend32(a.word[2*j+1]) * SignExtend32(b.word[2*j+1]) dst.dword[j] := Saturate32(src.dword[j] + tmp1 + tmp2) ELSE dst.dword[j] := 0 FI ENDFOR dst[MAX:512] := 0
